name: Salvation in Corruption
description: A world of magic, monsters, gods, and riches is on the horizon! Choose your path in an ever expanding world! Adventure awaits!
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
